commit message: Added tag 1.81 (1) for changeset feb8f96c57ee

- Read ALT-Text from tags of type IMAGE_ANCHOR too
- Read TITLE-Tag first, if empty read ALT-Tag
Updated copyright notices so they can be set automatically on commit and are handled completely by Android Studio
Added formatting rules for Android Studio to be as close to former rules as possible and formatted files
Ask for confirmation before marking virtual categories and feed-collections as read.

- Fixed lots of warnings from Android Studio
- Slight layout changes, buttons now appear a bit more Lollipop-Styled

- Fixed synchronisation issues with virtual categories when rotating device
- Slightly changed the visible items in the actionbar
- Slightly changed the visible items in the actionbar
Fixed problem with imageCache when synchronizing map access
Create README.md
Update README.md

Fixed issues with media loading
- Fixed Issue #268: disable media loading
- Fixed issue #269: Server-local cached images cannot be downloaded when HTTP Authentication is in use

Fixed issues with marking articles as read
- Fixed Issue #270: Option to disable 'All Read', 'Feed Read', 'Feeds Read' buttons
Thanks for providing a patch!

- Added YesNoDialog to marking a feed as read if the current feed is a union of all feeds of a category

Fixed privacy issue
- Fixed Issue #272: ttrss-reader calls home without asking for permission
If the user disables chrasreports the minSupportedVersion.txt is not updated anymore. I also included a hint in the preference regarding this issue.

Added copy content method by long press within an article
- Fixes Issue #248: Copy feed text

Tweaked swiping mechanism
- Only accept movement as a swipe if the horizontal distance was greater then the vertical distance
- Removed unnecessary files for Git project
Added necessary gradle files again
moved code
New project files

Attempt to animate article switching
- Animations for slide added
- Re-use of instance of articleFragment disabled
- Moved logic to find previous and next articles into FeedHeadlineActivity

Attempt to animate article switching
- Re-use of instance of FeedHeadlineListFragment disabled
- Moved logic to find previous and next feeds into FeedHeadlineActivity
- Temporarily added an invisble FeedListFragment to the layout
Update README.md
Update README.md

Formatting changed
Modified rules of Android  Studio to my liking:
- Tabs instead of spaces (Why did I use spaces in the first place?)
- Auto-Format on save has to be configured manually by adding a macro: http://stackoverflow.com/a/24852899
- Simple If-Statements are changed to one-line-statements now, I found now sane way to stop Android Studio from doing this

Applied rules to all files except localeapi. Some line-comments might be wrapped wrong.
Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/master'

Implemented animations for slide left and right
- CustomFrameLayout has been added as a wrapper around the ListView and WebView to allow for slide animation to be calculated without absolute pixel values
- Animations for slide in left/right and slide out left/right added
- Pop-BackStack Animation is supressed in Fragments when moving direction changed to avoid contradirectional movement, instead the inverted animation is shown
- Removed unnecessary code

Minor bugfix: No recalculation of counters when not connected, they can't change in that case and I don't have to wait too long while debugging.

Implemented animations for slide left and right
- Added preference to disable animations
- Use duration=config_shortAnimTime to avoid consuming too much time
-> TODO: Optimize Fragment-Loading since we cannot re-use the old ArticleFragment anymore. Currently I just rebuild everything which is too time-consuming

Bugfix for browsing unread articles
Cache the current list of articleIds in this Fragment. This is necessary to allow jumping between articles to stop at the end of the unread articles. The list in this fragments adapter is reloaded when there are no more unread articles but we still want to stop reading when the last unread has been reached.
